title: I simply can't study school syllabus anymore. Why? - Quora

response.answer_text: You’re at least not alone.I’m in the party too. It could be for many reasons It’s boring as hell.If it’s boring then it won’t take a genius to figure out that you don’t like it.This is my case in History and Geography:I have to learn a lot of shit about the Altai mountains and all that,nowhere near interesting.(This can also translate to “Not interested”.Which is the same thing as it would only appear boring to a person if s/he doesn’t have an interest in it.Good but the method of teaching is shitty.This could be due to a bad teacher or some other reason,such as the book not using any pictures whatsoever.You want to do something else Another big reason.Sometimes,it’s not bad,but you gotta/wanna do something else:and you simply procrastinate.I would not advice you to not-procrastinate,I’m the 3rd in my class and was the 1st last year but still procrastinate,it gives relief and sometimes,a good break,I wasn’t born to study my school’s shit!Remember this:If you mess up with grades/marks once,that is not the end of the world. Also, “Be yourself,you only get to live once,and this little life isn’t gonna give you a moment to waste.” If you’re low,listen to this song  The Script-“Hall of Fame”,Featuring Will.I.Am.
